archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.2.8a: a) core security governance and management documents (e.g. security strategy, security policy and security programme; project guidelines; security awareness programmes; security reviews and information risk management reports)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
